item.title: Why Neovim?
item.description:
Leaving VS Code was hard, but necessary.

The modal editing nature of Vim allows me to edit code at the “speed of thought”. Instead of reaching for the mouse to highlight a line, I simply press dd. To change the text inside parentheses, ci(.

It’s not just about speed; it’s about reducing friction between my brain and the codebase.
